title: Team pages of "internal" teams: link to Twitter lists
body_html:
Suggestion:

For these teams, replace the Twitter handle @RailsGirlsSoC on their team page with their corresponding Twitter list:

  • Team Helpdesk: railsgirlssoc -> railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-helpdesk (link)
  • Team Organizers: railsgirlssoc -> railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-organizers (link)

(There are more Twitter lists, but I saw there are no separate "team" pages for the mentors or coaches.)
body_text:
Suggestion:
For these teams, replace the Twitter handle @RailsGirlsSoC on their team page with their corresponding Twitter list:

Team Helpdesk: railsgirlssoc -> railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-helpdesk (link)
Team Organizers: railsgirlssoc -> railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-organizers (link)

(There are more Twitter lists, but I saw there are no separate "team" pages for the mentors or coaches.)
body:
Suggestion:

For these teams, replace the Twitter handle @railsgirlssoc on their team page with their corresponding Twitter list:
- [Team Helpdesk](http://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/teams/16): railsgirlssoc -> railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-helpdesk ([link](https://twitter.com/railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-helpdesk))
- [Team Organizers](http://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/teams/12): railsgirlssoc -> railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-organizers ([link](https://twitter.com/railsgirlssoc/rgsoc13-organizers))

(There are more Twitter lists, but I saw there are no separate "team" pages for the mentors or coaches.)
